blackdoor.util

Class CommandLineParser.Argument

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackdoor.util.CommandLineParser.Argument
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    CommandLineParser

    public static class CommandLineParser.Argument
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.lang.String helpText
      The string of text to enter along side the options for this argument in the help menu.
      (package private) boolean isParam
      True if this argument will never have an option in front of it.
      (package private) java.lang.String longOption
      Long form of command line option.
      (package private) boolean multipleAllowed
      True if this argument can occur more than one time in the command line.
      (package private) java.lang.String option
      Short form of command line option.
      (package private) boolean requiredArg
      True if this argument must be supplied.
      (package private) boolean takesValue
      True if this argument is a parameter or an option that takes values.
      (package private) java.lang.String valueHint
      The value hint that will appear in the help menu.
      (package private) boolean valueRequired
      True if this argument is a parameter or if there must be a value after this argument if it is an option.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> values
      Once an argument string from the command line is parsed, this list will be filled with any values attributable to this argument.

    • Field Detail

      • option

        java.lang.String option
        Short form of command line option.

        e.g. -f as in file

      • longOption

        java.lang.String longOption
        Long form of command line option.

        e.g. --file

      • values

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> values
        Once an argument string from the command line is parsed, this list will be filled with any values attributable to this argument.

      • helpText

        java.lang.String helpText
        The string of text to enter along side the options for this argument in the help menu.

      • valueHint

        java.lang.String valueHint
        The value hint that will appear in the help menu.

      • takesValue

        boolean takesValue
        True if this argument is a parameter or an option that takes values. False if this argument is an option that simply acts as a flag.

      • valueRequired

        boolean valueRequired
        True if this argument is a parameter or if there must be a value after this argument if it is an option.

      • isParam

        boolean isParam
        True if this argument will never have an option in front of it.

      • requiredArg

        boolean requiredArg
        True if this argument must be supplied. If requiredArg is true and this argument is not supplied in a command string then the help menu will be shown.

      • multipleAllowed

        boolean multipleAllowed
        True if this argument can occur more than one time in the command line.
